content: with 4 beads each 183 beads added top edging turn work and begin working along top edge of the shawl single_crochet and bsp into every double_crochet until the shawl center there are 2 center dcs the first and last st of row 1 single_crochet in the first center double_crochet pb and decrease over the two center dcs single_crochet in the second center double_crochet bsp and single_crochet into every double_crochet till end of the row slip_stitch in first single_crochet of row 56 fasten_off 111 beads added block to finished dimensions weave in ends wear and enjoy leaflines shawlette cid 13 c 2012 aparna rolfe all rights reserved leaflines shawlette cid 13 c 2012 aparna rolfe all rights reserved
